name: @bitwarden/cli
description: A secure and free password manager for all of your devices.
author: Bitwarden Inc. <hello@bitwarden.com> (https://bitwarden.com)

scripts.package: npm run package:win && npm run package:mac && npm run package:lin
scripts.package:win: npm run package:win:x64 && npm run package:win:arm64
scripts.package:mac: npm run package:mac:x64 && npm run package:mac:arm64
scripts.package:lin: npm run package:lin:x64 && npm run package:lin:arm64
scripts.dist: npm run build:prod && npm run clean && npm run package
scripts.dist:win: npm run build:prod && npm run clean && npm run package:win
scripts.dist:lin: npm run build:prod && npm run clean && npm run package:lin
scripts.dist:mac: npm run build:prod && npm run clean && npm run package:mac
scripts.dist:win:x64: npm run build:prod && npm run clean && npm run package:win:x64
scripts.dist:win:arm64: npm run build:prod && npm run clean && npm run package:win:arm64
scripts.dist:mac:x64: npm run build:prod && npm run clean && npm run package:mac:x64
scripts.dist:mac:arm64: npm run build:prod && npm run clean && npm run package:mac:arm64
scripts.dist:lin:x64: npm run build:prod && npm run clean && npm run package:lin:x64
scripts.dist:lin:arm64: npm run build:prod && npm run clean && npm run package:lin:arm64
scripts.publish:npm: npm run build:prod && npm publish --access public
